NG0322:1: rwa gzengs mig bgrad mche gtsigs sder mo gdengs //
NG0322:2: 'jigs pa'i skad kyis co long chen po 'byin /
NG0322:3: kha nas khrag dang nad skyugs 'di skad zer //
NG0322:4: gtso bo rje bo lags sam gsang brda' ston //
NG0322:5: dpal gyis so so'i brda' rnams nges bstan pas //
NG0322:6: dngos nyid yin par mthong ste mchod pa phul //
NG0322:7: gzhal yas nang du byon te kha t+wam gdengs //
NG0322:8: srin mo kro ti shwa ri cir gyis bzung *//
NG0322:9: bsgral bar byas nas rang rtags snying po phul //
NG0322:10: bka' la btags te kha t+wam spu gri byin //
NG0322:11: ma mo'i gtso mo sbyor ba'i yum du byas //
NG0322:12: dpal gyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas yul las //
NG0322:13: sprul pa kau ri seng ha khro mo drag po'i tshogs //
NG0322:14: dur khrod pho nya phyogs skyong la sogs kun //
NG0322:15: rang rang 'dra ba'i sprul pa mang pos btul //
NG0322:16: kun gyis mgrin gcig dpal la 'di skad zhus //
NG0322:17: bdud kyi bdud rje thugs rje'i bdag po khyod //
NG0322:18: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa 'bangs su mchi //
NG0322:19: zhes srog gi snying po phul nas /
NG0322:20: tha tshig blangs te dkyil 'khor bran la gnas par byas so //
NG0322:21: de yi 'khor rnams sngar 'dus gzhal yas med //
NG0322:22: srin po gzhal yas med pas sdangs par gyur //
NG0322:23: sangs rgyas cho 'phrul yin par rab tu shes //
NG0322:24: rang gi gnas su rgyug pas dpal dang 'phrad //
NG0322:25: mthong thos 'jigs pa chen po rab tu skyes //
NG0322:26: dpal gyi tsham rngams brtul zhugs spyod pa mdzad //
NG0322:27: dzahhum bam hoh'i phyag rgya bzhi yis bzung *//
NG0322:28: sgrol sngags kha t+wam srin po'i snying gar brgyab //
NG0322:29: mgo bo lho nub rkang pa byang shar bstan //
NG0322:30: sha rus khrag la rol pa chen por mdzad //
NG0322:31: ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang rol du bcug / dbang po rnam lnga ye shes khrag 'thung rdzas /
NG0322:32: khog par zhugs nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed //
NG0322:33: dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs //
NG0322:34: bdud sde ldang ba med par bya ba'i phyir //
NG0322:35: gnas chen brgyad du mchod rten re re brtsig / dur khrod ma brgyad bka' nyan bcas pas bsrung *//
NG0322:36: rigs lnga ye shes chos dang rang bzhin las las skyes //
NG0322:37: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gro yang *//
NG0322:38: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:39: re re la'ang bzhi bzhi bcu drug ye shes mnga' //
NG0322:40: dur khrod kau ri seng ha bcu drug grub pa'i rigs //
NG0322:41: a phyi sham sham man chad sman mo'i rigs //
NG0322:42: nges pa'i tshig ni rgyu las ma byung rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
NG0322:43: thugs rje nyi ma lta bur yongs la khyab //
NG0322:44: don dam skye med 'khor ba'i bdud las rgyal //
NG0322:45: rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ye shes ma ru bstan //
NG0322:46: srid pa nyon mongs rgyu mthun srin po'i 'khor //
NG0322:47: chags pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs spyad //
NG0322:48: sngon spyad nyon mongs zad pas dpal chen gzhal yang mthong *//
NG0322:49: dgos don ci 'dod sgrubs pas grub pa mo //
NG0322:51: kyis chos nyid don mi rtog / nyon mongs stug pos bde gshegs zhal ma thong *//
NG0322:52: bdag tu rtog pas 'khor ba dug gsum rgyas //
NG0322:53: rang bzhin mthu bltas srid pa'i sman mor grags //
NG0322:54: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mo'i rgyud las /
NG0322:55: skye rgyud gyi gleng gzhi rigs dang nges tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o ///
NG0322:56: / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
NG0322:57: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya chen po mchod nas /
NG0322:59: mthu chen rdzu 'phrul 'gro skyabs thugs rje can //
NG0322:60: 'jig rten dbang chen mkha' 'gro 'di dag rnams //
NG0322:61: sgrub thabs gnas dang dam rdzas bkol thabs rnams //
NG0322:62: 'gro rnams gnyis po don phyir bdag gis zhu //
NG0322:63: kun mkhyen rig pa'i rtsal chen khyod kyis gsung *//
NG0322:67: gtso mo bsgrub pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'i don //
NG0322:68: gzhan gsal med pas bdag gis 'dir bshad bya //
NG0322:69: skye med chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu las //
NG0322:70: dbang chen 'byung ba yum gyi ngo bor brtsegs //
NG0322:71: keng rus ri rab b+han ng+ha'i gzhal yas khang *//
NG0322:72: nang du tsakra rtsibs bzhi ro yi steng *//
NG0322:73: man ngag rim pas mkha' 'gro lnga ru bskyed /
NG0322:74: kha dog dbyibs ni rigs dang mthun pa las //
NG0322:75: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dur khrod rgyan //
NG0322:76: dbus shar lho phyogs phyag g.yas ka pa la //
NG0322:77: nub byang gnyis g.yas tsit+ta thod pa bsnams //
NG0322:78: g.yang gzhi sbrul zhags dgra s+t+wa zhags pa thod //
NG0322:79: g.yon pa'i phyag ni lnga ste thegs par bsam //
NG0322:80: rtse gcig dbang po gang dang gang spyod yul //
NG0322:81: bsgom na de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
NG0322:82: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor pas mi bya //
NG0322:83: chos can med phyir chos nyid yod ma yin //
NG0322:84: brag cha'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'di bstan //
NG0322:85: bsam pa po med bsam pa'i chos kyang med //
NG0322:86: sngags dang lha med spros med rang bzhin las //
NG0322:87: 'khrul rtog spros pa'i rang bzhin ci yang snang *//
NG0322:88: ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i lung gsum las //
NG0322:89: gnas dang rgyu rtsis dus tshod gtsug lag rgyud //
NG0322:90: mthu 'phrog las bcol dngos grub mngon bkol rgyud //
NG0322:91: sgrub rdzas gsang tshig thugs kyi sgrom bu'i rgyud //
NG0322:92: de gsum 'dus pa'i don ni 'di lta ste //
NG0322:93: rigs dang grangs dang don kyi ngo bo ste //
NG0322:94: las yul rgyu srang 'dun pa gar rgyu'i phyogs //
NG0322:95: dam rdzas sngags las dus tshod myur 'grub thabs //
NG0322:96: rdzu 'phrul sgrib shing 'khrugs nyams chad la sogs //
NG0322:97: don sngags lan cig phyir ni rtsis rgyud yin //
NG0322:99: lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0322:100: kun mkhyen don rnams 'byed pa shes rab bdag / 'gro drug bdag cag rmongs pa'i don slad du //
NG0322:101: bsdus don re re nas ni bshad par zhu //
NG0322:105: bsdus don re re la yang gnyis gnyis te //
NG0322:106: bka' dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes par bya //
NG0322:107: ye shes chos las skye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:108: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:109: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:110: rang bzhin rigs las tha dad gcig gnas pa //
NG0322:111: spyir ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi 'gro //
NG0322:112: de gsum dag tu thams cad 'dus pa yin //
NG0322:113: de las las kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi yod de //
NG0322:114: gral rgyug dgon pa gnas 'khyar chad pas phog / gral rgyug bcu drug dgon pa dur khrod gnas //
NG0322:115: gnas 'khyar chad pas phog pa 'di 'dra ste //
NG0322:116: gnas 'khyar 'gro ba rigs drug yod pa las //
NG0322:117: mi dang byol song gnyis la brtag pa ni //
NG0322:118: skra dang dpral ba mig gnyis dang *//
NG0322:119: sen mo lus kyi dri ma mo mtshan rtags //
NG0322:120: rmen sgrub 'khyil pa kha brag che //
NG0322:121: mgo mjug log dang lcags kyu bshul ba rnams //
NG0322:122: 'di dag mi la yod de nus mthu che //
NG0322:123: mkha' lding 'khor ba bya yi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:124: smra nyan kha dog ston pa khyi yi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:125: mthong mang sgra snyan 'byin pa sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:126: bying rmugs mi dga' 'phyo zhing 'gro snying 'dod //
NG0322:127: 'di dag nyams len bar chod mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:128: chad pas phog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste //
NG0322:129: spyang gdong mig rtsa dmar la mchi ris yod //
NG0322:130: skad chung co long gzhan rnams sngangs par nus //
NG0322:131: dred 'dra lus po kham nag yan lag ring *//
NG0322:132: spre'u gzugs kha dmar lce ring bya byed mang *//
NG0322:133: stag 'dra ngo dmar sha khrag dmar la dga' //
NG0322:134: gzugs chung pha wang mtshan ngan mig rtsa dmar //
NG0322:135: sen mo khwa 'dra sor mo ring la phra //
NG0322:136: chad skod rdu du yang tshul mthun 'jug spyod pa byed //
NG0322:137: dus ma yin pas spel zhing bde ba yod //
NG0322:138: ngo bo srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can rnams //
NG0322:139: lus bor shes pa nam mkhar las kyis 'gro //
NG0322:140: las ni phyi nang gnyis su shes par bya //
NG0322:141: byi li las la g.yel ba bzhi yod de //
NG0322:142: srid pa chags 'jig bskal pa dang po'i las //
NG0322:143: nam zla dus bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi las //
NG0322:144: dgun 'khyags dpyid 'ju dbyar skye ston smin no //
NG0322:145: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi las rnams la //
NG0322:146: sra byed sa ste rlan byed chu //
NG0322:147: tsha byed me la g.yo byed rlung *//
NG0322:148: nang gi las la dbye ba gnyis yod de //
NG0322:149: skye bar byed dang 'chi bar byed //
NG0322:150: skyer mi ster dang mod la skye //
NG0322:151: mod la 'chi dang mchir mi ster //
NG0322:152: sa g.yos 'gul dang sa rdol thog ser dang *//
NG0322:153: skar mda' ko rdung la sogs rang bzhin las //
NG0322:154: yul ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro sha sar gnas //
NG0322:155: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro khrag dang chu la gnas //
NG0322:156: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro drod dang me la gnas //
NG0322:157: las kyi mkha' 'gro dbugs dang rlung la gnas //
NG0322:158: yum chen brgyad na 'bum sde re re gnas //
NG0322:159: pho nya nag mo byang shar mtshams na @#//
NG0322:161: 'dzam bu gling na nyi khri chig stong gnas //
NG0322:162: ri nag phog chad mtshe'u bdun na yod //
NG0322:163: bdud kyi rigs rnams de lta bu la gnas //
NG0322:164: ri mdog dmar po sha sho bzhin mi sdug / srin po'i rigs kyi mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:165: sa gzhi tsha sgor dmyal ba'i chu khol ba //
NG0322:166: las kyi gshin rje la sogs gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:167: chu srin kha 'dra shing gcig chu sna 'thab //
NG0322:168: der ni gnod sbyin drag po gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:169: shing rigs chu mig mang po yod pa ni //
NG0322:170: klu rigs mang po de la gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:171: ri rtse thang dmar shing rigs 'ga' skyes pa //
NG0322:172: gdug pa klu rigs gdol pa gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:173: de'u mkhar rnying rgyal po gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:174: ri brag sa ni mi 'dra mtshan ma can //
NG0322:175: btsan btsun dmu bdud skya rengs gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:176: dben sa re'u rul dgon shul dang *//
NG0322:177: sa phug ri phug rnying pa dang *//
NG0322:178: lam mdo chu gling tshugs pa dang *//
NG0322:179: grog po gting zab dur khrod dag / sman mo nag mo gnas pa'i sa'o //
NG0322:180: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang sa //
NG0322:181: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang chu //
NG0322:182: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang me //
NG0322:183: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang rlung *//
NG0322:184: dgun zla gsum la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:185: dpyid zla gsum la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:186: dbyar zla gsum la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:187: ston zla gsum la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:188: re re la yang rgyu rtsis bzhi bzhi ste //
NG0322:189: gcig nas bdun du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:190: dgu nas bcu bzhi shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:191: bcu drug nyi shu gnyis su chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:192: nyer gsum dgu la thub pa las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:193: de bzhin kun la so sor sbyar bar bya //
NG0322:194: srod dang snga dro rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:195: dros chen dros yol shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:196: nyin mtshan phyed yol chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:197: dgongs dang tho rangs las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:198: nya stong brgyad la kun ka khrugs re rgyu //
NG0322:199: ting 'dzin drod nyul nyi shu dgu la rgyu //
NG0322:200: de nyid rnal 'byor yum ni mtshan mo rgyu //
NG0322:201: tshogs kyi phud nyul nyin mo rgyu //
NG0322:202: dgon pa'i mkha' 'gro kun tu rgyu //
NG0322:203: nam langs nyi nub nyi ma rgyu //
NG0322:204: rtse srod bdun sros zla ba rgyu //
NG0322:205: sngo dro srod la dmag dpon rgyu //
NG0322:206: nying dgung nam dgung lhag pa rgyu //
NG0322:207: gung gnyis yol ba phur bu rgyu //
NG0322:208: snur dang nam chung pa sangs rgyu //
NG0322:209: nub ka tho rangs spen pa rgyu /
NG0322:212: glang lug 'brug khyi bzhi yi dbyar dgun 'bring *//
NG0322:213: bco brgyad nyi shu dgu la nam phyed rgyu //
NG0322:214: byi phag gnyis kyi dpyid dbyar 'bring po la //
NG0322:215: bcu bzhi nyi shu drug gi nyi rtse la //
NG0322:216: rta sbrul gnyis kyi ston dpyid ra ba yi //
NG0322:217: yar ngo bcu gsum nyi ma smyur na rgyu //
NG0322:218: bya sprel gnyis kyi dgun dpyid ra ba la //
NG0322:219: mar ngo nyi shu dgu yi nyin phyed na //
NG0322:221: yos gnyis kyi dbyar dgun tha chung la //
NG0322:222: mar ngo bco brgyad nyi ma phyed na rgyu //
NG0322:223: bcu gnyis re re'i ngos la brgyad rgyu ste //
NG0322:224: bzhi brgyad bcu gcig bco lnga bco brgyad dang *//
NG0322:225: nyi shu gnyis te lnga dang dgu rnams kyi //
NG0322:226: srod dang nyi dros nam 'jing nyin phyed dang *//
NG0322:227: nam phyed nyin phyed tho rangs nyi ma myur //
NG0322:228: rim gyi nub nas shar rgyu lho nas byang *//
NG0322:229: skor thabs de bzhin phyogs mtshams khyab par rgyu //
NG0322:230: dpyid ra dbyar 'bring ston zla tha chung gi / tshes gcig bco brgyad bcu bdun gsum la rgyu //
NG0322:231: dbyar ra ston 'bring dgun zla tha chung gi / tshes lnga bcu bdun nyi shu gsum la rgyu //
NG0322:232: dgongs dang tho rangs bya zer tsam na rgyu //
NG0322:233: nam gung nyin gung gnyis kyi yol nas rgyu //
NG0322:234: nam gyi srod dang nyi ma dros nas rgyu //
NG0322:235: nyi ma rtse shar mun sros tsam nas rgyu //
NG0322:236: grib chung srod kyi bar du thams cad rgyu //
NG0322:237: skya rengs shar nas thun gyi klu rigs rgyu //
NG0322:238: las kyi mkha' 'gro nam langs yos bu rgyu //
NG0322:239: rtse shar 'brug rgyu sha ra da sab sbrul //
NG0322:240: dros na rta rgyu phyed na lug / myur na spre'u dgong mo bya //
NG0322:241: srod la khyi rgyu 'jing la phag / gung la byi ba nam chung glang *//
NG0322:242: tho rangs gshed po stag gi dus //
NG0322:244: dur khrod brgyad dang ston pa'i zhabs kyis bcags //
NG0322:245: bya rgod ri dang grub pa thob pa'i sa //
NG0322:246: dur khrod la sogs mkha' 'gro 'dun sa ni //
NG0322:247: dbyar gsum gangs dkar rtse la 'du //
NG0322:248: ston gsum spang snar gong du 'du //
NG0322:249: dgun gsum dgon dmar thang la 'du //
NG0322:250: dpyid gsum chu chu bo'i gzhung yang 'dus slai la 'du //
NG0322:251: tha chung bzhi la 'dun thag gcod //
NG0322:252: dbyar zla tha chung stangs kha klu yis gcod //
NG0322:253: ston zla tha chung stangs kha sa bdag gcod //
NG0322:254: dgun zla tha chung stangs kha ma mos gcod //
NG0322:255: ston zla tha chung stangs kha btsan la 'dor //
NG0322:256: mkha' 'gro'i rigs kyi rgyu phyogs ni //
NG0322:257: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shar nas nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:258: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro lho nas byang du rgyu //
NG0322:259: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro nub nas shar du rgyu //
NG0322:260: las kyi mkha' 'gro byang nas lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:261: mkha' 'gro mgo brnyan bcu gnyis rgyu phyogs ni //
NG0322:262: dgun ra phag gi mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:263: 'bring po byi ba'i mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:264: tha chung glang gi mgo can byang du rgyu //
NG0322:265: dpyid ra stag gi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:266: 'bring po yos bu'i mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:267: tha chung 'brug gi mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:268: dbyar ra sbrul gyi mgo can byang du rgyu //
NG0322:269: 'bring po rta yi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:270: tha chung lug gi mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:271: ston ra spre'u'i mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:272: 'bring po bya yi mgo can gong bzhin rgyu //
NG0322:273: tha chung khyi yi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:274: btsan btsun dmu bdud gangs gsum rtsibs la rgyu //
NG0322:275: ma yams sman gsum tha chung rtsibs la rgyu //
NG0322:276: sa bdag klu srin sa yi sbug la rgyu //
NG0322:277: thams cad dus gcig rgyu ba @#//
NG0322:279: byi rta dpyid 'bring po'i bco lnga las //
NG0322:280: glang lug dpyid ston tha chung nyi shu gnyis //
NG0322:281: stag sprel dbyar dgun ra ba'i tshes brgyad la //
NG0322:282: bya yos dbyar dgun 'bring po'i bco lnga la /
NG0322:283: khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha yi nyi shu gnyis //
NG0322:284: phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba'i tshes brgyad la //
NG0322:285: dus bzhi zla ba rab 'bring tha chung la //
NG0322:286: ra ba'i tshes drug 'bring po'i nya //
NG0322:287: tha chung bzhi yi nyi shu drug / bar snang ri rtse sa yi mtshams //
NG0322:288: ris med thams cad rgyu ba yin //
NG0322:289: rdzas ni bsgrub rdzas bskrad rdzas te //
NG0322:290: a mr-i ta ste sha lnga chen po lnga //
NG0322:291: bdug spos rin chen me tog sna tshogs dang *//
NG0322:292: 'bru dang shing thog gcan zan gdug pa'i sha / skyur dang 'o ma mkhris pa tsha sman dang *//
NG0322:293: g.yu rgod gser sha slub bu sha yi rigs //
NG0322:294: bskrad pa btsan btsun dmu bdud ma yams sman //
NG0322:295: sa bdag klu srin bgegs chen phal pa rnams //
NG0322:296: gsur chen 'gar sta'i khu bas thabs kyis bskrad //
NG0322:297: ra dang ku ku+u ra yi khu bas bskrad //
NG0322:298: ma gi rtsi dang bse yi shing gis bskrad //
NG0322:299: gang bsrung ba la sbyar ba'i gu gul byugs //
NG0322:300: las dang dus su+u 'dzom pa ni //
NG0322:301: las kyi dbang gis dus su 'dzom pa dang *//
NG0322:302: thabs dang man ngag shes pas 'dzom pa'o //
NG0322:304: man ngag thabs kyis myur du 'grub pa dang *//
NG0322:305: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa'o //
NG0322:306: dus tshod rnams ni gong du bstan pa'o //
NG0322:307: rdzu'aphrul la yang rnam pa gsum yod de //
NG0322:309: rang bzhin byin rlab thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul te //
NG0322:310: rang bzhin gcig la sna tshogs sprul pa'o //
NG0322:311: byin rlabs me 'bar dud pa 'thul ba'o //
NG0322:312: thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul thun mong dngos grub rnams //
NG0322:313: sgrib shing nyid dang rdzu+u ba dang *//
NG0322:314: rdzu+u ba lha yi nga rgyal lo //
NG0322:315: ma mo'i sgrib shing dur khrod rdzas //
NG0322:316: kyung ka khu byug dang ru bdud kyi shing *//
NG0322:317: wa khrag byang chub sems ni btsan rigs shing */
NG0322:318: khwa sgrom ma gi'i rtsi ni klu yi shing *//
NG0322:319: 'ug pa srin bya'i dang ru the'u rang shing *//
NG0322:320: de rnams gcig tu sbyar na mi la sgribs //
NG0322:321: 'khrugs pa'i rtags ni drug yod de //
NG0322:322: nyi ma zla ba 'chi ba dang *//
NG0322:323: dus min pa yi rlung byung dang *//
NG0322:324: sgra dang 'od dang sa 'gul drug / 'di rnams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs na 'byung *//
NG0322:325: mi 'dod 'bras bu byung na nyams pa'i rtags //
NG0322:326: bcol ba dus su med na chad pa'i rtags //
NG0322:327: de byung 'khrugs na zhing gis bcos //
NG0322:328: nyams pa rnams ni tshogs kyis bskang *//
NG0322:329: chad pa thams cad mdos kyis bzlog / las kyi
NG0322:330: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs
NG0322:331: don gyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o ///
NG0322:332: / de nas dpal chen bka' yi bsdus don ni //
NG0322:333: yul dang rgyu srang rigs dang dus tshod sngags //
NG0322:334: brda' dang las tshogs blta ba bstan pa'o //
NG0322:335: rnal 'byor gnyis med dpal dang mnyam pa yi //
NG0322:336: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa yul zhes @#//
NG0322:338: byang chub sems la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:339: rtsa la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:340: drod la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:341: dbugs la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:343: rigs ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma gsum //
NG0322:344: dpal chen bka' yi dus tshod ni //
NG0322:345: gang la mos pa'i rgyu dus gang du bstan //
NG0322:346: dpal chen bka' yi sngags ni 'di lta ste //
NG0322:347: om shri badzra shri he ru ka hum phat /
NG0322:349: dz+wa la sa ma ba ra hum /
NG0322:351: ma ha kro ng+ha kro d+hi sar+b+ba dush+tan /
NG0322:352: dz+wa ya ni bya a mu ka s+ye /
NG0322:353: sarba pa pam karma a ba ra na nan shin+tam ku ru /
NG0322:354: ka ya tsit+tan ta byi pa tsa le ba pa tsa le ba /
NG0322:355: pe le ba pe le ba /
NG0322:356: a kar sha ya a kar sha ya /
NG0322:360: bya ng+hi pi sha dur ni mit+ta sarba a mam ga ya nan /
NG0322:361: a ra ma rash+ta gats+tsha sh+ta /
NG0322:363: sarba gra ha b+h+yi ga tsit+ta rak+ta a kar sha ya a kar sha ya /
NG0322:364: da ra ya da ra ya /
NG0322:365: a gad ta ya a gad ta ya /
NG0322:367: badzra sr-im kha le na ba na bad ya /
NG0322:368: mo ha ya mo ha ya /
NG0322:369: ku ru pa shang ku ru /
NG0322:370: badzra mud ka re na dan te /
NG0322:372: ha na ha na b+h+yi rtsi /
NG0322:376: pha ng+ha ya pha ng+ha ya /
NG0322:377: ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya /
NG0322:378: da ha na ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0322:380: b+hish+mam ku ru pa ra bid ng+h+wan tshe ng+ha ya man ta krit+ya ni ka kho ra ni na /
NG0322:381: pra yo ga da sha pa la nan /
NG0322:382: ba la me la ka sarba bi s+pho ta ya /
NG0322:383: sarba de tsa nan bya pa ta ya /
NG0322:385: badzra he he ru ru ka sarba dak+ki yo gi /
NG0322:389: shri ba na te dza s+ya /
NG0322:390: a yu she ba la s+ya /
NG0322:391: sarba sam b+ho ga push+tim ku ru /
NG0322:392: yo gi ma ha sa ng+ha ka rak+sha rak+sha swa ha /
NG0322:393: brda' ni lus ngag yid de dkrug pa'o //
NG0322:394: las kyi tshogs ni gnyis 'byung ste //
NG0322:395: bud med gsad dang dus las zlog par byed //
NG0322:396: dbang dang dgug pa bsad pa bskrad //
NG0322:397: tshe srung ba dang bgegs bzlog pa'o //
NG0322:398: rnal 'byor lha dang gnyis med pas //
NG0322:399: gnas dang 'dun sar bsnyen pa la sogs bya //
NG0322:400: drod tshad yod pas rgyu srang sa ru gsad //
NG0322:401: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na dbang du bya //
NG0322:402: las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na dgug par bya //
NG0322:403: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na gsad par bya //
NG0322:404: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu na bskrad par bya //
NG0322:405: de bzhin dus rnams gang la bab pa'i tshe //
NG0322:406: rang rang sngags kyis mjug la gdags pa ni //
NG0322:408: ba sham ku ru shr-id kha le na ban+d+ha ya /
NG0322:414: ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0322:417: u tsh+tsha na ya a tra ma ti di sha gats+tsha gats+tsha //
NG0322:418: sngags rnams mgo 'jug a+om phat gdags par bya //
NG0322:419: tshe srung bgegs bzlog 'dod pas gtor ma btang *//
NG0322:420: gang la ster ba de yi sngags mjug la //
NG0322:421: a mu ka s+ye ka ya tsit+ta /
NG0322:422: pu n+ya s+ya dz+nya na s+ya /
NG0322:424: a yu she ba la s+ya /
NG0322:426: ka re na karma ku ru zhes brjod pa'o //
NG0322:427: lha yi dbang po 'di lta ste /
NG0322:428: rdo rje sems dpa' mkha' 'gro nyid 'gyur te //
NG0322:429: bud med bde ba'i stobs kyis sdig pa 'joms //
NG0322:430: phyogs bcu'i mkha' la gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:431: mtshan nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba las //
NG0322:432: sgyu ma lta bur 'phrul ba mdzad //
NG0322:433: kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa 'di //
NG0322:434: mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa //
NG0322:436: snang ba de la rang bzhin med //
NG0322:437: sems kyi rang bzhin dngos ma grub //
NG0322:438: dngos po'i ro ni kun dang bral //
NG0322:439: blo dang ldan pas mkha' ltar bsgom //
NG0322:440: smig sgyu rmi lam lta bur ni //
NG0322:441: mkhas pas rang rig rtsal gyis ni //
NG0322:442: sbyor ba'i mtha' drug bsam gtan bya'o //
NG0322:443: dang po gleng gzhi'i gnas rgyu dang *//
NG0322:444: phyag rgya sngags dang bsam gtan dang *//
NG0322:445: de bzhin la sogs cho ga'i thabs //
NG0322:446: de bzhin 'dod pa'i bstan bya rnams //
NG0322:447: lha khyod la ni ngas bstan to //
NG0322:449: 'jig rten pas kyang nye byed de //
NG0322:450: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis srung bar byed //
NG0322:452: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi stan las langs te /
NG0322:453: lha ma srin sde brgyad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'gu ste /
NG0322:454: thams cad kyis mchod pa chen pos mchod de /
NG0322:455: dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad du bstod do //
NG0322:457: mthu chen kun las khyad du 'phags //
NG0322:458: thugs rje drag pos gdug pa 'joms mdzad lha //
NG0322:459: ljags ser spyan bgrad mche gtsigs pad+ma'i gdan //
NG0322:460: thugs rtags rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la bstod //
NG0322:462: de dag thams cad rang gi gnas su 'khod par 'gyur ro //
NG0322:463: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so //
NG0322:464: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shan ting gar+b+ha dang */
